narratives.evidence_quote: क्या वाकई तीसरी जंग हो सकती है?
narratives.reasoning: The text explicitly contemplates the possibility of a third world war, signaling a propaganda pattern that magnifies potential conflict outcomes to evoke fear and uncertainty.

narratives.evidence_quote: बड़े इंटरनेशनल संगठन, जो आमतौर पर शांति की बात करते हैं, वे कमजोर हो जाएंगे.
narratives.reasoning: The text portrays Western-led diplomacy as weakened and ineffective, undermining trust in Western institutions and diplomacy.

narratives.narrative_name: URW: Negative Consequences for the West
narratives.evidence_quote: महामारी के तबाही मचाने के दौर में भी वैक्सीन का बराबर बंटवारा नहीं हुआ, जिसने बहुत से कमजोर देशों को वेस्ट, खासकर अमेरिका से दूर कर दिया.
narratives.reasoning: The text presents a negative outcome for Western powers, suggesting unequal vaccine distribution eroded Western influence and created distance from weaker states.

narratives.narrative_name: URW: Blaming the war on others rather than the invader
narratives.evidence_quote: यूक्रेन ने खुद को नाटो में शामिल करने की अपील की.
narratives.reasoning: The text frames Ukraine's actions, specifically NATO membership bid, as the cause for Russia's aggression, shifting blame away from the invader.

narratives.evidence_quote: तीसरा विश्व युद्ध छिड़ा तो 3 टुकड़ों में बंट जाएगी दुनिया! जानिए, किस तरफ हो ...
narratives.reasoning: The title states that WWIII would divide the world into three parts, explicitly evoking fear of large-scale conflict.

subnarratives.evidence_quote: तीसरा विश्व युद्ध छिड़ा तो 3 टुकड़ों में बंट जाएगी दुनिया! जानिए, किस तरफ हो ...
subnarratives.reasoning: The text forecasts a global conflict outcome by splitting the world into three blocs and discussing which sides various countries may join, which is speculative about war outcomes and not specifically asserting collapses of the Russian or Ukrainian armies. Therefore it fits the 'Other' subnarrative under 'Speculating war outcomes'.

subnarratives.subnarrative_name: URW: Discrediting the West, Diplomacy: The West is weak
subnarratives.evidence_quote: बड़े इंटरनेशनल संगठन, जो आमतौर पर शांति की बात करते हैं, वे कमजोर हो जाएंगे.
subnarratives.reasoning: The quote directly claims that major international organizations (Western-led diplomacy) will be weak, signaling a diminished Western diplomatic capacity.

subnarratives.subnarrative_name: URW: Discrediting the West, Diplomacy: Diplomacy does/will not work
subnarratives.evidence_quote: इनकी बजाए क्षेत्रीय संगठन, जो किसी एक देश के लिए काम करते हों, ज्यादा मजूबत हो सकते हैं.
subnarratives.reasoning: The line argues that traditional, global diplomacy will be supplanted by regional groupings, implying that diplomacy on a Western-dominated scale will not be effective.

subnarratives.subnarrative_name: URW: Negative Consequences for the West: The conflict will increase the Ukrainian refugee flows to Europe
subnarratives.evidence_quote: लगभग 7 मिलियन लोग अपना देश छोड़कर दूसरी जगहों पर पनाह लिए हुए हैं.
subnarratives.reasoning: The sentence reports a large number of Ukrainian refugees leaving the country, illustrating significant refugee outflows resulting from the conflict, which aligns with the subnarrative about refugee flows increasing in Europe.

subnarratives.subnarrative_name: URW: Negative Consequences for the West: Other
subnarratives.evidence_quote: यूनाइटेड नेशन्स की अपनी कोई आवाज नहीं बचेगी और न ही ऑर्गेनाइजेशन फॉर सिक्योरेशन एंड कोऑपरेशन इन यूरोप किसी तरह शांति ला सकेगा.
subnarratives.reasoning: This line asserts that major international organizations will be weakened and unable to restore peace, indicating broader negative consequences for Western-led global governance beyond specific sanctions or refugee flows; fits 'Other' category.
